content: the little knit hedgehogs are here to turn your yarn scraps into woodland whimsy they re perfect for using up those little pieces that are too small to do anything else with knit them up as cat toys adorable decorations or simply wee stuffed animals this pattern is also available for free on my blog 1 **size** the finished hedgehog is approximately 9-10cm / 3 5-4 long and 7-7 5cm / 2 75-3 circumference **yarn and yardage** the hedgehog uses fingering weight sock yarn and needs about 30-35 yards total c1 needs 25-30 yards and c2 needs 5 yards sock yarn with nylon or silk or a high twist is preferred as it will be more durable black embroidery thread or scraps of black fingering weight yarn is needed for the eyes **notions** knitting needles dpns or circulars darning needle two pieces of scrap black fingering weight yarn for eyes polyfill for stuffing **techniques** the hedgehog is knit in the round and the ears are knit flat this pattern serves as a good introduction to stuffed animal knitting > join my newsletter 2 to hear about new patterns and blog posts and get access to exclusive discounts 1 https //www classicsongbird ca/blog/free-knitting-pattern-little-knit-hedgehogs 2 https //www classicsongbird ca/knitters-newsletter
